00019 #include "LineSegmentsMobilityBase.h"
00020 
00021 #include <FWMath.h>
00022 
00023 void LineSegmentsMobilityBase::initialize(int stage) {
00024   BaseMobility::initialize(stage);
00025 }
00026 
00027 void LineSegmentsMobilityBase::beginNextMove(cMessage *msg)
00028 {
00029   debugEV << "beginNextMove, startPos: " << move.getStartPos().info() << " stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << " targetPos: "
00030        << targetPos.info() << endl << "simTime: " << simTime() << " targetTime: " << targetTime << endl;;
00031 
00032     // go to exact position where previous statement was supposed to finish
00033     move.setStart(targetPos, simTime());
00034     stepTarget = targetPos;
00035     simtime_t now = targetTime;
00036 
00037     // choose new targetTime and targetPos
00038     setTargetPosition();
00039 
00040     debugEV << "startPos: " << move.getStartPos().info() << " targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << endl;
00041 
00042     if (targetTime<now)
00043         error("LineSegmentsMobilityBase: targetTime<now was set in %s's beginNextMove()", getClassName());
00044 
00045     if( move.getSpeed() <= 0 ){
00046         // end of movement
00047         stepSize.x = (0);
00048         stepSize.y = (0);
00049         stepSize.z = (0);
00050         debugEV << "speed < 0; stop moving!\n";
00051         delete msg;
00052     }
00053     else if (targetPos==move.getStartPos()){
00054         // no movement, just wait
00055       debugEV << "warning, we are not moving!\n";
00056         stepSize.x = (0);
00057         stepSize.y = (0);
00058         stepSize.z = (0);
00059         scheduleAt(std::max(targetTime,simTime()), msg);
00060     }
00061     else{
00062         // keep moving
00063         double numIntervals = (targetTime-now) / updateInterval;
00064         // int numSteps = floor(numIntervals); -- currently unused,
00065         // although we could use step counting instead of comparing
00066         // simTime() to targetTime each step.
00067 
00068         // Note: step = speed*updateInterval = distance/time*updateInterval =
00069         //        = (targetPos-pos) / (targetTime-now) * updateInterval =
00070         //        = (targetPos-pos) / numIntervals
00071         stepSize = (targetPos - move.getStartPos());
00072 
00073   move.setDirectionByTarget( targetPos );
00074 
00075   stepSize    = stepSize / numIntervals;
00076   stepTarget += stepSize;
00077 
00078   move.setSpeed(move.getStartPos().distance( targetPos ) / (targetTime - now ));
00079 
00080   debugEV << "numIntervals: " << numIntervals << " now: " << now << " simTime " << simTime() << " stepTarget: "
00081      << stepTarget.info() << " speed: " << move.getSpeed() << endl;
00082 
00083         scheduleAt(simTime() + updateInterval, msg);
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void LineSegmentsMobilityBase::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00088 {
00089     if( move.getSpeed() <= 0 ){
00090         delete msg;
00091         return;
00092     }
00093     else if (simTime()+updateInterval >= targetTime){
00094         beginNextMove(msg);
00095     }
00096     else{
00097       debugEV << "make next step\n";
00098 
00099         scheduleAt(simTime() + updateInterval, msg);
00100 
00101     // update position
00102     move.setStart(stepTarget, simTime());
00103     stepTarget += stepSize;
00104     }
00105 
00106     // do something if we reach the wall
00107     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00108 
00109     updatePosition();
00110 }
